title: Gee Gadgets Micro USB Cable Keychain - Android Charging Cord with PU Leather Tassel and Keyring - Gold
features: FUNCTIONAL FASHION: Create a fashion statement from your charging cables! Our tassels elegantly conceal cords while making a sophisticated accessory to attach to your handbag or keys.
PORTABLE POWER: Have a charger on hand anytime, anywhere, with our key chain USB cable. Go out and about all day without worrying about finding a wire to charge your cell phone battery.
CUSTOMIZE YOUR CHARGE: Whether you have a smartphone that requires a micro USB cable, an Apple device that requires a lightning chord, or both, we have all 3 options available for you.
UNIVERSAL APPEAL: Both men and women of all ages will find a tassel to love with our selection of 7 colors, including neutrals like black, white and brown as well as brights like red, gold and pink.
QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Our durable PU leather tassels are durable and won’t rip and tear. Our sturdy metal keyring with trigger easily attaches to handbags, purses and backpacks.
description: Tired of your phone battery dying while you’re out and on the go? Do charging cables and cords get tangled in your handbag? Then this tasseled keychain charging cable is your solution. Its handy charging cable allows you to power up your portable devices while on the go, while its tassel conceals cables and adds a touch of class.

No matter what type of device you use - whether you’re a hardcore Apple fan, avid Android user, or someone who alternates between both, we have something that will work for you. Choose from a Micro USB only cable, a Lightning cable only, or a Micro USB/Lightning Cable combo. Power up your smartphone, iPad, tablet, Kindle and more!
Genuine Leather Tassel Tassel Length: 172 mm Cable length: 118 mm
- Micro USB & Lightning Cable Combo- Micro USB Only- Lightning Cable Only
- Black- Brown- Dark Brown- White- Pink- Red- Gold (PU Leather)

While this Tassel Keychain Charging Cable is a stylish accessory, it functions as a practical tool. The cable chargers reliably power up your devices and do not suddenly stop working as cheaper competitors do. Our key ring clasps, made of durable metal, easily attach to handbags, keys and more, staying securely fastened without snapping and breaking.

Our genuine leather tassels have a luxurious look and feel, unlike faux leather competitors that look tacky and cheap. Available in 7 different colors, our tassels suit men and women alike and can satisfy any taste. Choose from our neutrals, black, brown, white, and dark brown, as well as our bright gold, red and pink. Perhaps even purchase more than one, a neutral for your conservative workplace and a bright color for fun, casual outings. This Tassel Keychain Charging Cable also makes a great Christmas stocking stuffer or birthday gift.
